front.div:
Abstract. Is there a connection between the branch point singularity at the particle
emission threshold and the appearance of cluster states which reveal the structure of
a corresponding reaction channel? Which nuclear states are most impacted by the
coupling to the scattering continuum? What should be the most important steps in
developing the theory that will truly unify nuclear structure and nuclear reactions?
The common denominator of these questions is the continuum shell-model approach
to bound and unbound nuclear states, nuclear decays, and reactions.
